headline: EG Q3 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates on Poor Underwriting Show

headline: Billtrust Named a Leader in Everest Group's 2025 Order-to-Cash Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment
summary: Billtrust, the leader in B2B accounts receivable (AR) workflow and payment software, is proud to announce its designation as a Leader in the Everest Group Order-to-Cash (O2C) Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025, the highest category among 14 evaluated providers. Access the full report here.

headline: Everest Group (EG) Margin Miss Challenges Bull Narratives Ahead of Earnings Season
summary: Everest Group (EG) reported profit margins of 3.1%, down sharply from 16.7% a year ago. Earnings growth over the past year turned negative despite a strong five-year annual earnings growth rate of 14%. With shares trading at $309.45, well below an estimated fair value of $1,423.95, investors are watching forecasts that call for a robust 51.7% annual earnings growth going forward. This would outpace the US market’s 15.6% average, even as revenue is expected to decline by 0.7% per year over the...

headline: AM Best Revises Outlooks to Negative for Compañía de Seguros Generales Everest Mexico, S.A. de C.V.
summary: MEXICO CITY, October 30, 2025--AM Best has revised the outlooks to negative from stable and affirmed the Financial Strength Rating (FSR) of A+ (Superior) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Ratings (Long-Term ICR) of "aa-" (Superior) of Compañía de Seguros Generales Everest Mexico, S.A. de C.V. (Everest Mexico) (Mexico City, Mexico). Concurrently, AM Best has affirmed the National Scale Rating (NSR) of "aaa.MX" (Exceptional). The outlook of the NSR is stable.
